Procurement Sucks.
So We decided to fix it.

Bidcurement automates soliciting the bids you need from trusted, local contractors.

Schedule your demo to see how Bidcurement can revolutionize your procurement process:

Save yourself (and your staff) from pointless calls, constant followup, and thousands of pages of bid docs. Bidcurement saves small and local governments, education departments, and civil engineering firms from the worst parts of the procurement process. The results? Highly competitive bids fr​om trusted talent, in no t​ime flat. We're building networks between local contractors and the agencies that need them, all around the country, and saving everyone time, money, and trouble in the process. Think of us like SLED superheroes - without the over-the-pants underwear. How it Works​
